messageText: Just got the call from the principalâ€¦ I got the job!
oh my god that's amazing!!!! i'm so happy for you!! how's hubby taking the news?
He's really happy for me too. We're going out to celebrate tonight!
hey so how's the first week of teaching going? you settling in okay?
It's going well, thanks. The kids are lovely and I've met a really nice colleague, Mr. Anderson. He's been very helpful and has given me some great advice.
aw that's so cool! sounds like you're off to a great start! we should grab coffee soon and catch up!
Hey Angie, I need to talk to you about something that's been freaking me out.
whats going on? u sound serious
I think someone's been following me. I've seen this black car behind me on the way home from school for the past few days.
whoa thats creepy! have u seen the driver? do u think its someone from school?
No, I haven't seen the driver. And I don't know if it's someone from school, but it's really unsettling. I'm getting a bit scared, to be honest.
aw girl dont worry we'll figure it out do u want me to come over and we can talk about it in person?
Not now, I'm okay. Just needed to talk to someone about it. Don't mention it to anyone, okay? Especially not my husband, he'd just get paranoid and worried.
my lips are sealed dont worry i got ur back
hey girl i need to talk to u about something i found out
What's up? I've been meaning to talk to you too. Something weird happened with Mr. Anderson yesterday.
whats going on with him?
Yesterday he made some really creepy comments about my clothes and asked me personal questions. And then I found something weird on his desk...
what did u find?!
A map of my route home from school. I think he's the one who's been following me!
oh my god thats so creepy! i did some digging and i found out hes not even supposed to be working at the school! some creepy past going on
What?! Why is he working here?!
i dont know but i think we should report him to the principal or something this is getting too weird
I'm scared, Angie. What if he does something to me? But at the same time, I don't want to ruin my reputation at the school...
hey girl i think u should tell ur husband whats been going on
I don't know, Angie. I'm scared of how he'll react. He's been really jealous and insecure lately, and I don't want to make things worse.
but emily this is serious u cant deal with this alone u need to tell him whats going on
I know, but what if he thinks it's my fault? He can get really angry and possessive...
emily u need to be honest with him and tell him how u feel maybe he'll surprise u and be supportive
I'll think about it, Angie. But I'm really scared of how he'll react...
emily i cant believe what u told me about ur husband's reaction i'm so angry
I know, Angie. I'm still in shock. He completely flipped out and accused me of attracting unwanted attention.
thats unbelievable! how could he not support u in this?! u need him to be on ur side
emily u deserve so much better than that u need someone who's gonna support u no matter what
But what can I do? I love him...
girl u need to take care of urself and do whats best for u dont let him make u feel like this is ur fault
Angie, it's getting worse. My husband wants me to quit my job because of what happened.
what?! thats ridiculous! u cant let him control u like that
I know, but he's being really unreasonable. He says I was fancying that pig and that's why it all happened. Can you believe that?
thats disgusting! how could he even think that?! u need to stand up for urself and not let him make u feel guilty
I'm trying, Angie, but it's hard. He doesn't even want to go to the police with me. He just wants me to quit and forget about it.
dont quit emily! u love ur job and u're good at it dont let him take that away from u
I don't know, Angie. I feel like I'm losing myself in all of this. I don't know what to do anymore...
girl u need to be strong and do whats best for u dont let him dictate ur life u got this!

Merry Christmas from HealthFirst Insurance! We're spreading cheer with a special holiday offer: 10% off all new policies purchased by Dec 31st! Call us at 1-800-HEALTH-1 to learn more and get a quote. Don't miss out on this limited-time opportunity to protect your loved ones and save!

Alert: Your Horizon account is past due. Unfortunately, we've had to suspend your service due to nonpayment. To restore service, please pay your outstanding balance of $156.02 by visiting our website or calling 1-800-HORIZON. Failure to pay will result in permanent disconnection.

Hello Mrs. Emily, this is AutoFix. We've tried calling you several times, but haven't heard back. Your car has been ready for pickup for a few days now. Please let us know when you can come by to collect it. Thanks!

Mrs. Emily, we're still trying to reach you about your car. We've had it ready for over a week now and are starting to incur storage fees. If we don't hear from you soon, we'll have to consider alternative options to cover our costs. Please call us ASAP to arrange pickup. 555-1234
Hi, I need to cancel my appointment for tomorrow. Something unexpected came up. Sorry for the short notice.
Hi, sorry to hear that. Can you please confirm your name and appointment time so we can cancel it for you?
It's Emily, and I was supposed to come in at 2 pm tomorrow. Thanks for understanding.
Okay, Emily, we've cancelled your appointment. Would you like to reschedule for another time? We have some openings next week.
Yes, that would be great. What times do you have available?
How about Wednesday at 5 pm? We can fit you in then. Let us know if that works for you.
Wednesday at 5 pm sounds perfect. I'll see you then.
Great, we'll see you Wednesday at 5 pm. Just a reminder, we require 24 hours notice for any cancellations or changes. Looking forward to seeing you then.
Dr. Lee, I need to speak with you about an urgent matter. Can I come to your office to discuss it with you in person?
Of course, Emily. I'll make sure to clear some time for you today. When were you thinking of coming in?
As soon as possible, please. I'm available now if that works for you.
Okay, I can see you now. Please come to my office and I'll make sure to see you right away. Just let the receptionist know that you're here to see me and she'll show you in.
You deleted this message
Emily!!! It's been ages! I was going through some old photos and I found some from our school days. I couldn't believe how long it's been since we last spoke! How are you doing?
Mia!!! Oh my goodness, it's so great to hear from you! I've been doing okay, just busy with life. How about you? What have you been up to all these years?

I've been good! I got married, had two kids, and moved to the suburbs. You know, the usual. But I've been thinking about you a lot lately and wondering what could have been if we'd stayed in touch. Do you ever think about those days?
All the time! I've often thought about what could have been if we'd stayed close. But I'm so glad we're reconnecting now!
We should catch up soon, maybe over coffee or something?
Hi Principal Smith, I need to speak with you about a serious matter. Would it be possible to meet with you tomorrow?
Of course, Emily. I have a meeting at 9 am, but I'm free after that. Is everything okay?
Yes, everything will be fine. I just need to discuss something with you in person. How about 10 am tomorrow?
10 am tomorrow sounds fine. I'll make sure to clear my schedule. See you then, Emily.

Emily, I'm extremely concerned that you didn't show up to work today, and we also had a scheduled meeting that you missed. Is everything okay? We've had no word from you and we're starting to get worried. Please let us know if you're safe and if there's something going on that we can help with.
